about_the_game:
Innerscape places you inside a human body transformed by a rogue parasite. Miniaturized and sent on a critical mission, you are a scientist tasked with eliminating a bioweapon that has evolved beyond control.

  • Gameplay: Utilize the specialized BioStim Gun, equipped with different syringe types to interact with the organic surroundings. Open pathways with stimulator syringes and remove obstacles using dissolver syringes.

  • Puzzles and Challenges: Solve intricate puzzles that require you to manipulate biological mechanisms to progress deeper into the body.

  • Setting and Atmosphere: Explore the inner workings of a living body, where organs and tissues form a labyrinthine environment filled with dangers. Immerse yourself in a world where every sound and visual detail contributes to the sense of being inside a living organism altered by an unknown threat.

  • Environmental Storytelling: Navigate through twisting corridors and chambers, encountering remnants of those who came before.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains mature themes, including graphic depictions of body horror, grotesque environments and creatures, violent imagery, such as dead bodies, blood, and a dark, tense atmosphere that may be uncomfortable for sensitive players.

short_description: Play as a scientist in this short sci-fi horror adventure, tasked with eradicating a mutating parasite within a human body. Navigate eerie corridors, solve complex puzzles, and survive the lurking horrors inside.
